education.school: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: Plant Disease Detection using Machine Learning
projects.description: Developed a web-based application using Streamlit for real-time plant disease detection, integrating a user-friendly interface with machine learning capabilities. Utilized a large dataset from Kaggle to train Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) for accurate classification of plant diseases, leveraging TensorFlow and Keras frameworks. Implemented data analysis and visualization techniques using libraries such as NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, and Seaborn, to preprocess data and interpret model performance. Optimized the model for accuracy and efficiency, resulting in improved disease detection rates, contributing to potential advancements in agricultural technology.

projects.name: House Price Prediction Model
projects.description: Utilized KNIME Software for comprehensive data analysis, including preprocessing, visualization, and the application of machine learning algorithms, enhancing the efficiency of workflow management. Developed a predictive model for house prices using linear regression, leveraging KNIME's tools to streamline the data pipeline and ensure accurate predictions.

projects.name: Diwali Sales Analysis
projects.description: Executed thorough data cleaning and preprocessing on a Kaggle dataset to ensure accuracy and reliability in the analysis of Diwali Fest product sales. Developed insightful visualizations using Python libraries like Matplotlib and Seaborn, highlighting key sales trends and consumer behaviour patterns. Applied advanced data analysis techniques with NumPy and Pandas, providing actionable insights and recommendations for optimizing sales strategies.

experiences.description: Led and coordinated technical events and hackathons, enhancing member engagements and technical skills within the GeeksforGeeks Student Chapter. Collaborated with faculty and industry experts to organize guest lectures and webinars, bridging the gap between academic learning and real-world applications. Managed chapter operations, including recruitment, event promotion, ensuring efficient execution, and increased participation.

Completed a job simulation where I strengthened my PowerBI skills to better understand clients and their data visualisation needs. Demonstrated expertise in data visualization through the creation of Power BI dashboards that effectively conveyed KPIs, showcasing the ability to respond to client requests with well-designed solutions. Leveraged analytical problem-solving skills to examine HR data, particularly focusing on gender-related KPIs, and identified root causes for gender balance issues at the executive management level, highlighting a commitment to data-driven decision-making.

experiences.role_name: Data Analytics and Visualization Job Simulation
experiences.description: Completed a simulation focused on advising a hypothetical social media client as a Data Analyst at Accenture. Cleaned, modelled, and analysed 7 datasets to uncover insights into content trends to inform strategic decisions. Prepared a PowerPoint deck and video presentation to communicate key insights for the client and internal stakeholders.
